description.narrative: The development objective of this project is to reduce the vulnerability of the coastal population to natural disasters across selected coastal districts of Bangladesh.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Audit | Description :LGED will ensure that audited financial statements are submitted to IDA within six monthsafter the end of each fiscal year | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Environment and Social Safeguards | Description :LGED will implement the Project in accordance with theprovisions of the ESMF/TDF, the Environmental Code of Practice and the relevant Safeguard Assessments and Plans | Frequency:CONTINUOUS
Finance Agreement :Governance | Description :The Government and LGED shall carry out the Governance and Accountability Action Plan(GAAP) in accordance with its terms. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Implementation | Description :LGED will ensure that (i) a Project Steering Committee (PSC); a Project ManagementUnit (PMU); and a Procurement Panel (PP), all with composition, functions and resources satisfactory to IDA are maintainedthroughout the duration of the project. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Reporting | Description :LGED will (i) monitor the physical and financial progress of the Project, (ii) analyzethe data on key performance indicators; and (iii) prepare and submit quarterly financial and progress reports as well as progressreports on the GAAP within 45 days following the end of each quarter. | Frequency :Quarterly
